author.department: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science

preface.p: This is a collection of definitions, examples, and activities intended for use in a typical second semester calculus course. The activities are designed to introduce new ideas to students in class as they work in groups.
The author is in the process of recoding this material from its original LaTeX source code to PreTeXt code. The materials may appear incomplete at times, as the process is ongoing.

part.title: Sequences and Summations
part.introduction: To make sense of Riemann sums, we will first study sequences and summations.
